column2: Choose one, if all are taken take 1d6 damage instead: Your skin takes on a pearlescent sheen, as if covered in raw oil; You faintly glow in the dark making sneaking difficult; Your eyes constatnly shift hue unnaturally; You become obsessed with colourful and shiny things, causing you to be drawn to them regardless of cirmcumstance;
You lose this spell until the next time you rest for at least 8 hours and gain a Corruption.
One target within 10' must make an END response against the spellcheck or become blinded and stunned for 1d4 rounds.
All targets in a 10'x10' cone must make an END response against the spellcheck or become blinded and stunned for 1d6 rounds.
All targets in a 10'x15' cone must make an END responseagainst the spellcheck or become blinded and stunned for 1d8 rounds.
All targets in a 15'x15' cone must make an END response against the spellcheck or become blinded, deafened, and stunned for 1d10 rounds.
All targets in a 15'x20' cone must make an END response against the spellcheck or become blinded, deafened, and stunned for 2d6 rounds.
All targets in a 20 square foot area must make an END response against the spellcheck or become blinded, deafened, and paralyzed for 2d6 rounds.  On a successful save, they are only blinded.
